meanings.sent1: Please don't outstay your welcome at the party.
meanings.sent2: I tend to outstay my visits at my friend's house.
meanings.sent3: He always manages to outstay his welcome without even realizing it.
meanings.sent4: The smell of fresh cookies can easily make you outstay your diet plans.
meanings.sent5: The suspense in the movie made me outstay my bedtime.

meanings.definition: To remain longer than is wanted or welcome
meanings.sent1: If you outstay your visit, it might become awkward.
meanings.sent2: She tends to outstay her appointments at the salon.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to outstay its nap and explore the house instead.
meanings.sent4: The memories of that day will outstay the test of time.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the sunset made us outstay our evening walk.
